participant_1.background:
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I am worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
i love to laugh.

participant_2.background:
I'm glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.
I am a thirty-something male who decided to quit my job and travel the world for a couple of months.
I remember writing short stories and making movies with my friends when I was a child.
i love the outdoors.
my son plays on the local football team.

content.text: hi! what's up?
Hi there! I'm doing well, just finished a hike through the woods.
that sounds fun! i love hiking. do you go often?
yes, i try to go at least once a week. it's a great way to get exercise and enjoy nature.
i agree! it's also a good way to clear your head.
yes, it really is.
have you ever been to any interesting places while hiking?
yes, i have! i've been to a lot of different national parks.
i've always wanted to go to a national park.
you should! they're amazing.
i know, i know. i'll have to make it a point to go soon.
good! you won't regret it.
i'm sure i won't.
what's your favorite thing about hiking?
i love being outside and surrounded by nature. it's so peaceful.
yes, it is. i also love the challenge of hiking. it's a great workout.
me too! i love the feeling of accomplishment when you reach the top of a mountain.
yes, that's the best feeling!
what's your favorite hiking trail?
i have a few, but i really love the one in the smoky mountains. it's a beautiful hike with amazing views.
that sounds amazing! i'll have to check it out.
good! i'm sure you'll love it.
